DataElement.preferredName: Health Status Assessment Clinical Observation Unique Record Link Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.:The act, by a healthcare worker, of monitoring an identified subject and recording signs, symptoms, or behavior._The single one of its kind._A sequence of characters used as a linkage between related records.:A sequence of characters used as a linkage between related records._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a physician or registered nurse, based on clinical and laboratory data, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.  2. The process by which a patient's condition is appraised or evaluated. (Taber's)
